mapper.sql: flash_promotion_id, flash_promotion_title, start_time, end_time, is_publish_status, create_time, update_time,is_home_status,cpy_type
mapper.select:
select sfp.flash_promotion_id, sfp.flash_promotion_title, sfp.start_time, sfp.end_time, sfp.is_publish_status, sfp.create_time, sfp.update_time, sfp.is_home_status, fpp.flash_promotion_pdt_id fpp_flash_promotion_pdt_id, fpp.flash_promotion_id fpp_flash_promotion_id, fpp.flash_promotion_sn_id fpp_flash_promotion_sn_id, fpp.flash_promotion_price fpp_flash_promotion_price, SUM(fpp.flash_promotion_count) fpp_flash_promotion_count, fpp.flash_promotion_limit fpp_flash_promotion_limit, fpp.sort fpp_sort, fpp.create_time fpp_create_time, fpp.update_time fpp_update_time, pp.product_id fpp_product_id, pp.product_name fpp_product_name, pp.partner_id fpp_partner_id, pp.pic fpp_pic, pp.price fpp_price, pp.partner_id, up.latitude fpp_lat, up.longitude fpp_lng,
from sms_flash_promotion sfp left join sms_flash_promotion_product fpp on sfp.flash_promotion_id = fpp.flash_promotion_id left join pms_product pp on pp.product_id = fpp.product_id LEFT JOIN ums_partner up ON pp.partner_id = up.partner_id
sfp.is_publish_status = 1 and fpp.flash_product_status = 2 AND NOW() <= sfp.`end_time` AND DATE(sfp.`end_time`) = CURRENT_DATE() AND DATE(sfp.`start_time`) = CURRENT_DATE()
and fpp.user_id is null
and fpp.user_id > 0
GROUP BY fpp.`product_id`,fpp.`flash_promotion_price`,fpp.`cpy_type` ORDER BY fpp.flash_promotion_pdt_id DESC limit 20;

select from sms_flash_promotion where is_publish_status = 1 and is_home_status = 1 and cpy_type = #{cpyType} AND NOW() <= `end_time` AND DATE(`end_time`) = CURRENT_DATE() AND DATE(`start_time`) = CURRENT_DATE() limit 1;
select from sms_flash_promotion AS sfp WHERE sfp.`cpy_type` = #{cpyType} AND sfp.`start_time` >= NOW() AND sfp.`is_publish_status` = 1 ORDER BY sfp.`start_time` ASC LIMIT 1
SELECT * FROM `sms_flash_promotion` AS sfp WHERE #{timeStr} BETWEEN sfp.`start_time` AND sfp.`end_time` LIMIT 1

SELECT sfp.`flash_promotion_id`, sfp.`flash_promotion_title`, sfp.`start_time`, sfp.`end_time`, sfp.`is_publish_status` AS publishStatus, sfp.`is_home_status` AS homeStatus, sfp.`cpy_type` FROM `sms_flash_promotion` AS sfp WHERE sfp.`cpy_type` = #{cpyType} AND NOW() < sfp.`end_time` AND sfp.`is_publish_status` = 1 ORDER BY sfp.`end_time` ASC LIMIT 1;
SELECT sfp.`flash_promotion_id` FROM `sms_flash_promotion` AS sfp WHERE sfp.`end_time` BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d 00:00:00') AND DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d 23:59:59')

SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(sfp.`flash_promotion_id`) AS `flashPromotionId` ,sfp.`end_time` AS `date` FROM `sms_flash_promotion` AS sfp WHERE sfp.`end_time` > NOW() AND sfp.`is_publish_status` = 1 GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(sfp.`end_time`,"%Y-%m-%d") ORDER BY sfp.`end_time` DESC

SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(sfp.`flash_promotion_id`) AS `flashPromotionId` ,sfp.`end_time` AS `date` FROM `sms_flash_promotion` AS sfp WHERE DATE_FORMAT(sfp.`end_time`,"%Y%m%d") = #{date} AND sfp.`is_publish_status` = 1 GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(sfp.`end_time`,"%Y-%m-%d") ORDER BY sfp.`end_time` DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT sfp.`flash_promotion_id`,sfp.`start_time` FROM `sms_flash_promotion` AS sfp WHERE sfp.`flash_promotion_id` != #{flashPromotionId} AND sfp.`is_publish_status` = 1 AND sfp.`cpy_type` = #{cpyType} AND sfp.`start_time` > NOW() ORDER BY sfp.`start_time` ASC LIMIT 1

select oo.order_id, oo.total_amount * 1.005 as total_amount, ooi.product_pic, ooi.product_name, sfpp.flash_promotion_price, oo.receiver_name, oo.receiver_phone, oo.receiver_address, oo.order_sn, oo.pay_type, oo.payment_time, oo.delivery_company, oo.order_status, oo.pay_amount from oms_order oo left join oms_order_item ooi on oo.order_id = ooi.order_id left join sms_flash_promotion_product sfpp on oo.order_id = sfpp.order_id WHERE oo.order_id = #{orderId};
